betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oYou do not have to craft this right away, but if you are struggling with making Shyrelands Garnets fast enough, the Summons of the Shyre Warden can help you out with that.

§fSome things are only understood after taking a step back, and looking at the whole instead of the detail.
That is definitely the case with regards to mythic excavation.
The mythic matter originating from the Shyrelands, while it would be easy to think so given Xxeus' powers, in its essence, is completely divorced from the imperialistic nature of the warren where it originated.
To harvest mythic matter from the Shyrelands, I do not have to rely on the power of Rule that held it together.
Well not directly, I will have to cast one final spell, encompassing all the powers of the lands of the Shyre Empire.
After this moment, though, the last trace of Xxeus' influence will be gone.
